feed.title: The Mind Illuminated
feed.subtitle: Robert's experiences following 'The Mind Illuminated' book.

entry.title: Starting up
entry.content: I have now started working with the book. Today I have been working with reading up on Stage One “Establishing a Practice”.
entry.summary: I have now started working with the book. Today I have been working with reading up on Stage One “Establishing a Practice”.

entry.title: First week with ‘The Mind Illuminated’
entry.content: This week I will work primarily with the Stage One from the book, “Establishing a practice”.
entry.summary: This week I will work primarily with the Stage One from the book, “Establishing a practice”.
